turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can place the order for you. which starbucks should i place an order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one on Archer Avenue in Downtown Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what would you like from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a hot venti caramel macchiato with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 hot venti caramel macchiato with 2% milk from starbucks on archer avenue in downtown chicago will be $4.55. should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've placed your order. it'll be ready for pick up in approximately 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. i just sent the receipt to your mobile device, take care.
